thread.title: SYSTAG to Showcase Product Range at CPhI Worldwide
thread.title_full: SYSTAG to Showcase Product Range at CPhI Worldwide

title: SYSTAG to Showcase Product Range at CPhI Worldwide
text:
SYSTAG to Showcase Product Range at CPhI Worldwide Friday, September 04, 2015 by SYSTAG, System Technik AG Print Email 
SYSTAG, a specialist in automation for fine chemicals and pharmaceutical processes, will use the upcoming CPhI Worldwide event to showcase its comprehensive controlled lab reactor range of ready-to-run equipment designed by chemists for chemists. 
SYSTAG's innovative systems such as FlexyCUBE and FlexyPAT controlled lab reactors and FlexyPlant plant control systems are designed to provide easy scale up in F&E for chemical engineering, process optimisation and thermal process safety. 
This range of tools and equipment are also designed to make laboratory processes more reliable, economical and safer. 
SYSTAG's stand at Booth 4H50 in Hall 4 at the IFEMA, Feria de Madrid will showcase examples of all the key systems. 
The company will share the stand with long time collaborators and high precision thermoregulation specialists Huber KÃ¤ltemaschinenbau GmbH from Offenburg, Germany. Follow Us:
